mcq.statement: Which statement about the ulna is correct? It links the radius to the scapula, It fits into a notch on the radius to form the elbow joint, It forms a hinge joint with the humerus at the shoulder, It has a projection to which an extensor muscle is attached

options.a: It links the radius to the scapula
options.b: It fits into a notch on the radius to form the elbow joint
options.c: It forms a hinge joint with the humerus at the shoulder
options.d: It has a projection to which an extensor muscle is attached
